sen.j: 丹後神崎駅（たんごかんざきえき）は、京都府舞鶴市油江にある、北近畿タンゴ鉄道(KTR)北近畿タンゴ鉄道宮津線の鉄道駅。
sen.e: Located in Yugo, Maizuru City, Kyoto Prefecture, Tango-Kanzaki Station is a stop of the Miyazu Line, which is operated by Kitakinki Tango Railway (KTR).
Tango-Kanzaki Station, located in Yugo, Maizuru City, Kyoto Prefecture, is a stop on the Miyazu Line, which is operated by Kitakinki Tango Railway (KTR).
Tango-Kanzaki Station, located in Yugo, Maizuru City, Kyoto Prefecture, is a stop on the Miyazu Line, which is operated by Kitakinki Tango Railway (KTR).

sen.j: 臨時で特別急行列車「タンゴディスカバリー」（京都駅発着・西日本旅客鉄道山陰本線（嵯峨野線）・舞鶴線経由 久美浜・豊岡駅 (兵庫県)・城崎温泉駅方面行）が停車する場合があるが、基本的には普通列車（全列車ワンマンカー・西舞鶴駅〜豊岡駅 (兵庫県)（一部は網野駅・福知山駅（宮福線経由））間に運行）のみ停車する。
sen.e: The "Tango Discovery" limited express trains (which start at and return to Kyoto Station and go to the areas of Kumihama Station, Toyooka Station (Hyogo Prefecture) and Kinosakionsen Station via the San'in Main Line (the Sagano Line) and Maizuru Line of West Japan Railway Company (JR West)) sometimes stop at this station on special occasions, but basically, only local trains (all operated, by one person, between Nishi-Maizuru Station and Toyooka Station (Hyogo Prefecture), with some of them between Amino Station and Fukuchiyama Station (via the Miyafuku Line)) stop here.

The "Tango Discovery" limited express trains (which start at and return to Kyoto Station and go to Kumihama Station, Toyooka Station (Hyogo Prefecture) and Kinosakionsen Station via the San'in Main Line (Sagano Line) and the Maizuru Line of West Japan Railway Company (JR West)) sometimes stop at this station on special occasions, but basically only local trains (all operated by one person between Nishi-Maizuru Station and Toyooka Station (Hyogo Prefecture), but some of them between Amino Station and Fukuchiyama Station (via the Miyafuku Line)) stop here.

The trains of Limited Express 'Tango Discovery' (which arrive at and depart from Kyoto Station and go to Kumihama Station, Toyooka Station (Hyogo Prefecture) and Kinosakionsen Station via the Sanin Main Line (Sagano Line) and the Maizuru Line of West Japan Railway Company (JR West)) sometimes stop at this station on special occasions, but basically only local trains (all operated by one person between Nishi-Maizuru Station and Toyooka Station (Hyogo Prefecture), but some of them between Amino Station and Fukuchiyama Station (via the Miyafuku Line)) stop here.
sen.cmt: Limited Express 'Tango Discovery' としました。アポストロフィを削除し、Sanin としました。"start at and return to" -> "arrive at and depart from" に変更しました。

sen.j: 丹後神崎駅から西舞鶴駅までは、舞鶴市内を走る。
sen.e: The trains between Tango-Kanzaki Station and Nishi-Maizuru Station run within Maizuru City.
The trains between Tango-Kanzaki Station and Nishi-Maizuru Station run within Maizuru City.
The trains between Tango-Kanzaki Station and Nishi-Maizuru Station run within Maizuru City.

tit.cmt: 他の記事と統一しました。

sen.j: 単式1面1線の無人駅。
sen.e: An unmanned station with a platporm serving a track
It is an unmanned station with a platform serving a track.
It is an unmanned station with a platform serving a track.

tit.cmt: 他の記事と統一しました。

sen.j: 神崎海水浴場（徒歩10分程度）
sen.e: The Kanzaki sea-bathing beach (around ten minutes on foot)
The Kanzaki sea-bathing beach (approximately ten minutes on foot)
The Kanzaki sea-bathing beach (approximately ten minutes on foot)

sen.j: 毎年7月1日に海開きが行われるが、夏季には海水浴客のために、特急列車「タンゴディスカバリー」が臨時停車する。
sen.e: A ceremony for starting a sea-bathing season formerly is held on July 1of every year, and the "Tango Discovery" limited express trains stop at this station for the sea bathers in the summer.
A ceremony for the start of the sea-bathing season formerly is held on July 1 each year, and during that season the "Tango Discovery" limited express trains stop at this station for sea bathers.
A ceremony for the start of the sea-bathing season is held on July 1 each year, and during that season the Limited Express 'Tango Discovery' stops at this station for sea bathers.
sen.cmt: Limited Express 'Tango Discovery' としました。

sen.j: 神崎煉瓦ホフマン式輪窯 - 全国に4基現存するホフマン窯の一つ。
sen.e: The Hoffmann style ring kiln of old Kanzaki Brickyard: one of the four Hoffmannsytle kils still remaining in Japan
The Hoffmann-style ring kiln of the old Kanzaki Brickyard is one of the four Hoffmann-style kilns remaining in Japan.
The Hoffmann-style ring kiln of the old Kanzaki Brickyard is one of the four Hoffmann-style kilns remaining in Japan.

sen.j: 2006年度の1日あたりの乗車人員は約27人である。

In fiscal 2006, the average daily number of persons who boarded at this station was 27.
In fiscal year 2006, the average daily number of persons who boarded at this station was 27.

sen.e: June 22, 1924 - Its operation started.
June 22, 1924: The station became operational.
(April 12, 1924: The station became operational.)

sen.j: 1957年（昭和32年）6月22日 - 地元からの請願駅として開業。
sen.e: June 22, 1987 - This station, the construction of which had been requested by people in the area, started its operation.
June 22, 1987: The station, the construction of which had been requested by people in the area, went into operation.
June 22, 1957: The station, the construction of which had been requested by people in the area, went into operation.

sen.j: 1987年（昭和62年）4月1日 - 日本国有鉄道分割民営化により、西日本旅客鉄道の駅となる。
sen.e: April 1, 1987 - Due to the division and privitization of Japan National Railways, it became a station of West Japan Railway Company (JR West).
April 1, 1987: Due to the division and privatization of Japan National Railways, it became a station of West Japan Railway Company (JR West).
April 1, 1987: Due to the division and privatization of Japan National Railways, it became a station of West Japan Railway Company (JR West).

sen.j: 1990年（平成2年）4月1日 - 宮津線が北近畿タンゴ鉄道に移管され、同鉄道の駅となる。
sen.e: April 1, 1990 - The Miyazu Line was transferred to Kitakinki Tango Railway, and it became a station of the railway company.
April 1, 1990: The Miyazu Line was transferred to Kitakinki Tango Railway, and it became a station of that railway company.
April 1, 1990: The Miyazu Line was transferred to Kitakinki Tango Railway, and it became a station of that railway company.

sen.j: 2006年（平成18年） - 便所が改築され水洗化される。
sen.e: 2006 - The lavatory was reformed to a flush toilet.
2006: The lavatory was converted to a flush toilet.
2006: The lavatory was converted to a flush toilet.

tit.cmt: 他の記事と統一しました。
